title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 620 - Incorporations And Transfers Of Proprietary Businesses
content:

State Regulations
§ 620.1 - Establishment of business corporations
§ 620.2 - Transfers of interest by sole proprietors or partnerships

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 620

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
